Note:
----------------   CREW RETRIEVER   --------------
PASTE the text created by the crew app on the WHITE CARD "description" 
conextMenu - > click last text box option
CTRL+A -> CTRL+V  -> close
CLICK the button.

------------------  CONDITIONS   -----------------
CLICK AROUND the health bar
 (mostly invisible when off) 
CLICK and RIGHT CLICK to change Value
HEALTH / AURA  behave the same

----------------   MOVE MODEL   -----------------
HOVER model and use 1-9 to start a 1-9Â¨ Move  use '0' for a Limitless Move
CLICK to set waypoints
DOUBLE CLICK to confirm
RIGHT CLICK to remove waypoint or abort

----------------   EXTRA MODELS   ---------------
If you need some extra reference card get it from the side boxes grouped by faction
heavy image download expected

13.title: Manual
13.body:
Welcome to the M4E Mod! This manual assumes you know how to play Malifaux.

To begin click on your name at the top right hand side of the screen then choose ether to be the red or blue color

Once you choose a color rightclick the nodecard beside your player board and post your crew.
 
You can find a crew creater that will format your crew for you in the discord.

Once you import your crew click on the Regtrueve Crew Button.

If you are having issues with the Retrive Crew Function you can  search for the cards in the Reference cards by Faction bags.

If you are still having trouble please report the issue at the discord.

To choose a map to play on drop one of the Map bags onto the Map Manager.  To rotate the map click on the Rotate Map button.  If the map looks offcenter you can click the Fix Map button.

After you choose a map and both you are your opponent imported your crews preced to decide who the attack, defender, and the strategy is per Malifaux rules.  Make sure to shuffle those decks first!

You can turn on the deployment overlay by pressing the  white button at the top righthand side of the screen.  The Rotate Deployment button is to the left of that button.  Some automattic strategy setup requires you to have a deployment zone overlay on.

Click on the appropriate Strategy setup button to automattically setup strategy markers.

Shuffle the scheme deck and deal out the top 3 cards.  Each player can choose the scheme they want from their personal scheme deck.

Now you should be ready to play a game of Malifaux!

To add a condition to a model just drop the token onto the model.  You can then click the condition to remove it.

To use the move manager press top row number key corresponding to the amount in inches you wish to move.  Left click to place a break point and double click to comfirm your movement.  Right click to cancel your last breakpoint or the entire move.

MusicPlayer.CurrentAudioTitle: Beware the Forest Mushrooms - Yoko Shimomura

ObjectStates.Name: BlockSquare
ObjectStates.Description:
This tool makes sure all players (present and future) are promoted so they have "host" powers: delete/spawn/copy/paste/etc.

The tool also takes care that deliberately demoted players are never automatically promoted again (such as if they drop & rejoin or if time is rewound).

You'll probably want to hide this underneath the table, disable tooltip, and disable interactivity (see script).
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
--::[[ Auto Player Promoter ]]::--
-- Version 1.0
-- By Kevin O'Mara (Quickle)
-- https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197997376704

--[[
This script runs in the background and makes sure all players are promoted so
they have "host" powers (delete/spawn/copy/paste/etc.) For more info on host:
http://berserk-games.com/knowledgebase/player-roles/

Additionally, if a player gets "demoted", the script takes care they are never
automatically promoted again (i.e. when the player drops and re-joins the match,
the game is saved and loaded in the future, or time is rewound/fast forwarded).

Players are promoted at the following times:
* All players are promoted each time the game first loads (including Undo/Redo).
* New players are promoted upon joining the match.

Whether a player is "demoted" is recorded at the following times:
* All players are recorded when the game saves (including auto saves).
* Individual players are recorded when they leave the match.

Undo / Redo
* Undo - A demoted player may become promoted again if time rewinds to a point
  when they were previously promoted.
* Redo - A player will never become demoted when time fast forwards, even if
  they had previously been demoted at that autosave.
--]]



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--[[ CONFIGURATION  ]]----------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--[[
You can modify the script's behavior by changing these variables:
--]]

-- When true, this object is interactable by Players.
-- You may wish to lock this object and hide it somewhere. To do so, simply:
--  1. Set this value to 'true' & save the script.
--  2. Move the object somewhere & save the game.
--  3. Set this value back to 'false' & save the script.
local objectIsInteractable = false

-- When true, a chat message announces each time a player is automatically
-- promoted or would have been promoted (but wasn't because they are "demoted").
-- Lets players know they are being promoted by a script rather than the host.
local chatEnabled = false

-- When true, debug information is written the log window (host only).
local loggingEnabled = false


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--[[ SCRIPT CODE  ]]------------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--[[ Utility Methods ]]---------------------------------------------------------

local function _log(element, label)
    -- Log a message with the prefix "AutoPlayerPromoter: ".
    -- Wrapper for `log()`: https://api.tabletopsimulator.com/base/#log
    if loggingEnabled then
        log(element, "AutoPlayerPromoter: " .. tostring(label))
    end
end

local function _printToAll(message)
    -- Print a message to chat, but only if `chatEnabled` is `true`.
    -- Wrapper for `print()`: https://api.tabletopsimulator.com/base/#print
    if chatEnabled then
        printToAll(message)
    end
end

local function _playerAsTable(player)
    -- Return a <Player> object (https://api.tabletopsimulator.com/player/) as a
    -- simple key-value table, which can be expanded by the built-in logging
    -- method: https://api.tabletopsimulator.com/base/#log
    return {
        steam_name  = player.steam_name,
        steam_id    = player.steam_id,
        promoted    = player.promoted,
        host        = player.host,
        admin       = player.admin,
        color       = player.color,
        team        = player.team,
        seated      = player.seated,
        blindfolded = player.blindfolded,
        lift_height = player.lift_height,
    }
end
--//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////



--[[ Player Promotion Tracker ]]------------------------------------------------
--[[
Keeps track of which players are demoted and offers a method to promote players.
--]]

-- Steam IDs of Players who have had their promotion revoked.
-- @type: Set<string>
local _demotedPlayerSteamIds = {}

function isOnDemotedPlayerList(player)
    -- @param player <Player> (https://api.tabletopsimulator.com/player/)
    return _demotedPlayerSteamIds[player.steam_id] ~= nil
end

function isPromoted(player)
    -- @param player <Player> (https://api.tabletopsimulator.com/player/)
    return player.promoted or player.host
end

function tryPromotePlayer(player)
    -- @param player <Player> (https://api.tabletopsimulator.com/player/)
    if isOnDemotedPlayerList(player) then
        _log(_playerAsTable(player), "Will not promote player because they are on the Demoted Player List: ")
        _printToAll("AutoPlayerPromoter: Not promoting player " .. tostring(player.steam_name) .. ", because they were demoted by host.")
    elseif isPromoted(player) then
        _log(_playerAsTable(player), "Will not promote player because they are already promoted or host: ")
    else
        _log(_playerAsTable(player), "Promoting player: ")
        _printToAll("AutoPlayerPromoter: Promoting " .. tostring(player.steam_name))
        player.promote()
    end
end

function savePlayerPromotionState(player)
    -- @param player <Player> (https://api.tabletopsimulator.com/player/)
    if isPromoted(player) then
        _log(_playerAsTable(player), "Saving player's promotion status. Player is <promoted>: ")
        _demotedPlayerSteamIds[player.steam_id] = nil
    else
        _log(_playerAsTable(player), "Saving player's promotion status. Player is <demoted>: ")
        _demotedPlayerSteamIds[player.steam_id] = {}
    end
end
--//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////



--[[ Event Hooks ]]-------------------------------------------------------------
--[[
Makes sure players are getting promoted and recorded at the right times by
responding to events.
--]]

function onLoad(saveData)
    self.interactable = objectIsInteractable

    _log(saveData, "Loading from script state: ")
    if saveData == "" then
        _demotedPlayerSteamIds = {}
    else
        _demotedPlayerSteamIds = JSON.decode(saveData)
    end

    local players = Player.getPlayers()
    for _, player in ipairs(players) do
        tryPromotePlayer(player)
    end
end

function onPlayerConnect(player)
    -- @param player <Player> (https://api.tabletopsimulator.com/player/)
    tryPromotePlayer(player)
end

function onPlayerDisconnect(player)
    -- @param player <Player> (https://api.tabletopsimulator.com/player/)
    savePlayerPromotionState(player)
end

function onSave()
    local players = Player.getPlayers()
    for _, player in ipairs(players) do
        savePlayerPromotionState(player)
    end

    saveData = JSON.encode(_demotedPlayerSteamIds)
    _log(saveData, "Saving script state: ")
    return saveData
end
--//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

ObjectStates.Name: Checker_black
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
TRH_Class = "token"
local config = {
}
--used to determin if the token already collided with a mini.  If the token is traveling fast enought it can colide multiple times before the self.destruct call is called
local colided=false

--I kinda hate how this is set up right now.  I should make it that each token calls a globle script so when i make changes it updates each token automaticall
--THis is probably what should happen on all generated assets with scripts.
--i wonder if lua has a extends functionallity.   Could create a sript that has this kind of function that every token inhearets.  I'll look into that later
function onCollisionEnter(col)
    if colided then
        return 0
    end
    config.count = math.max(1, self.getQuantity())
    if ((col.collision_object.getVar("TRH_Class") or "") == "mini") then
        colided=true
        if (col.collision_object.call("addMarker", config)) then self.destruct() end
    end
end

ChildObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ChildObjects.LuaScript:
TRH_Class = "token"

local config = {
    --name: must be unique to your mod.
    --url: url of the asset used on the marker. Consider the design of the image and use this one as an example (white with a black outline seems to work best for contrast's sake)
    --color: valid hex color of the marker
    --stacks: true or false - can the mini receive this marker more than once.
    name="Hasted", url="https://steamusercontent-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1019447087554369193/9FC768C81E9EF00BB41E7FBAB40F58CE474A71A4/", color="#FFffff", stacks=false
}

function onCollisionEnter(col)
    config.count = math.max(1, self.getQuantity())
    if ((col.collision_object.getVar("TRH_Class") or "") == "mini") then
        if (col.collision_object.call("addMarker", config)) then self.destruct() end
    end
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Token
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
f_color = {0,0,0,95}
local firstTokenPosition={ x=-16.905245,y= 1.01,z=5.013737}
local firstBagPosition= { x=4.954772, y=1.01, z=-16.97987 }
local objectLib={
    libeary="d41eb9";
    baseToken="030e0e";
    baseBag="d84712";
    specialTokenBag="7abb2f";
}
local scoringTokenBag={
    Strategy="b469ee";
    Guild="7c0835";
    Arcanists="edf269";
    Resurrectionist="68a770";
    Neverborn="31f5d9";
    Outcasts="44e232";
    Bayou="fe97e9";
    ExplorersSociety="898648";
    TenThunders="10de55";
}
local tokenLib={}
local bagLib={}
local waitBase=1
function onLoad(save_state)
    self.createButton({
        label="",
        click_function="genTokens",
        tooltip="Gen Tokens",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.11,0},
        height=600,
        width=1000,
        alignment = 3,
        scale={x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5},
        font_size=300,
        font_color=f_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })
end

function genTokens(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    --print(getObjectFromGUID(objectLib.baseToken).getPosition())
    --return true
    
    local libeary=getObjectFromGUID(objectLib.libeary)
    local generalTokens=libeary.call("getGenearyLibeary")
    local wait=waitBase
    local slot=1
    local specialTokesn=libeary.call("getSpecialLibeary")
    for key,token in pairs(specialTokesn) do

       
        Wait.frames(function() createToken(token,slot) end,wait)
        wait=wait+waitBase
        Wait.frames(function() createBag(token,slot) slot=slot+1 end,wait)
        wait=wait+waitBase
        Wait.frames(function() joinBag(token) end,wait)
        wait=wait+waitBase
        Wait.frames(function() moveSpecialTokensToBag(token) end,wait+500)
        wait=wait+waitBase
        --return false

    end
    slot=slot+8
    local scoringTokesn=libeary.call("getScoringLibeary")
    for key,token in pairs(scoringTokesn) do

        log(token.name)
        Wait.frames(function() createToken(token,slot) slot=slot+1 end,wait)
        wait=wait+waitBase
        Wait.frames(function() moveToScoringBag(token) end,wait+500)
        wait=wait+waitBase
        --return false

    end
end

function createToken(token,slot)
    local pos=getTokenSlotPosition(slot)
    local newToken=getObjectFromGUID(objectLib.baseToken).clone({position=pos})
    Wait.frames(function() newToken.call("setConfig",token) end,1)
    tokenLib[token.name]=newToken.getGUID()
end

function createBag(token,slot)
    local pos=getTokenSlotPosition(slot)
    local newBag=getObjectFromGUID(objectLib.baseBag).clone({position=pos})
    newBag.setName(token.name)
    --Wait.frames(function() newBag.call("setConfig",token) end,1)
    bagLib[token.name]=newBag.getGUID()
end

function getTokenSlotPosition(slot)
    local row = 0
    local targetPos = slot
    while targetPos >= 7.5 do
        row = row + 1
        targetPos = targetPos - 7
    end
    
    return Vector( firstTokenPosition.x+ row * 3,firstTokenPosition.y  ,firstTokenPosition.z - ((targetPos) * ( 2.5)))
end


function getBagSlotPosition(slot)
    local row = 0
    local targetPos = slot
    while targetPos >= 7.5 do
        row = row + 1
        targetPos = targetPos - 7
    end
    
    return Vector( firstBagPosition.x+ row * 3,firstBagPosition.y  ,firstBagPosition.z - ((targetPos) * ( 8)))
end

function moveTokenToBag(token,bag)
    token.setPosition(bag.getPosition())
end

function joinBag(token)
    local bag=getObjectFromGUID(bagLib[token.name])
    local newToken=getObjectFromGUID(tokenLib[token.name])
    bag.setPosition(newToken.getPosition())
    bag.destroyAttachments()
    bag.addAttachment(newToken)
    local nextToken=newToken.clone({position=bag.getPosition()})
    local thickness=0.01
    if token.ht~="0" then
        thickness=token.ht
    end
    --Wait.frames(function() nextToken.call("setThickness",thickness)end, 1)
    --bag.setPosition(getObjectFromGUID(objectLib.specialTokenBag).getPosition():add(Vector(0,10,0)))
end

function moveSpecialTokensToBag(token)
    local bag=getObjectFromGUID(bagLib[token.name])
    getObjectFromGUID(objectLib.specialTokenBag).putObject(bag)
end

function moveToScoringBag(token)
    local newToken=getObjectFromGUID(tokenLib[token.name])
    getObjectFromGUID(scoringTokenBag[token.name]).putObject(newToken)
end

If it does, it does not infuse a soulstone for being killed and, after the model is removed, this crew may summon a model of the same name within 1" of this marker with a Flicker token and 2 health. Then remove this marker.
